name: Selling personal property, defined
text: §233-3  Selling personal property, defined.  As used in this chapter "the business of selling tangible personal property" includes both business classed as such under chapter 237 and also the rendering of a service which involves the consumption or use of tangible personal property furnished by the "potential employer" referred to in section 233-1. [L 1959, c 277, §5(b); Supp, §117A-3; HRS §233-3]
